group_1.textLeft: Oh crap... there's only one prize per group...

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's what the rules say.

group_1.textLeft: I didn't read them properly...

group_1.textRight: I didn't either...

group_1.textLeft: We have to select the prize we want before we@post the movie!

group_1.textRight: Hikaru, you wanted that year's supply of ice@cream, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! It's for Yuna!
No way!
We already decided on that stuffed sweaty@bunny toy!

group_1.textRight: Yeah... we wanted to give it to Momoko.

group_1.textLeft: Why don't we calm down and discuss this@rationally?

group_1.textRight: Yozuru...

group_1.textLeft: I am participating in this project because the@endeavor itself is what matters to me...
I'm indifferent to whatever prize we choose.@The rest of you can split it among yourselves.

group_1.textRight: I should've guessed you weren't in it for the@prizes.
I was trying to come up with a deal for you to give@up your share, but it looks like there was no need.

group_1.textLeft: Well... I wanted the prize for Momoko, but...
I don't want us to fight over it...

group_1.textRight: I refuse to accept anything but the ice cream!
A year's supply is too tempting!

group_1.textLeft: I'm not giving up, either! I know what Momoko@wants,
And I'm going to get it!
...What's the point of making a movie together@if we can't even agree with what we want?

group_1.textRight: You're right.

group_1.textLeft: But if we don't make a movie, then we can't get@a prize.

group_1.textRight: If having sufficient footage is concerning you,@there's no need to worry.

group_1.textLeft: Um... what are you...?

group_1.textRight: I've had my camera running all day.

group_1.textLeft: All day...? You mean, all this time, you've been...?

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: ...WHAT?!
So that's why you wanted to be the referee@during the volleyball game!

group_1.textRight: If you'd like, why don't we take a look at the@video?
Wh-wh-wh-what are we supposed to do?!

group_1.textLeft: There’s only one thing we CAN do! We have to@climb, NOW!
No, there's plenty of things we can do.
Like, how about we see which one of us can@score the most points in this game?

group_1.textRight: Hm... Alright. Let's do it!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what's all this...?!

group_1.textRight: This is humiliating...!

group_1.textLeft: This is amazing, Yozuru!
With just a little bit of editing, we can make a@great coming-of-age story with this!

group_1.textRight: If this will suffice,
Then why don't we cancel tomorrow's shoot@and compile a video with this?
We can negotiate the prize before we submit@our movie.

group_1.textLeft: Nope, nope, nope!
I was acting like such a brat in those clips!@If you sent it all in, I'd die of embarrassment!

group_1.textRight: I was so childish during those fights with Rena...
If Yuna saw that... I think I'd crawl into a hole@and hide for the rest of my life...

group_1.textLeft: So we're back onto the filming plan for tomorrow?

group_1.textCenter: I'll do it for the stuffed bunny / ice cream.

group_1.textLeft: That does it! I'm breaking up the team for good!

group_1.textRight: ...So it looks like the team that got the sweaty@bunny doll was...
A group of elementary and high school students?
Their video was... "It's Darkest Under the@Lighthouse," it looks like.
Huh? Wait a second... that boy...!

group_1.textLeft: You're right!

group_1.textRight: You know him?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yeah... sort of.

group_1.textRight: Speakin' of acquaintances...
You guys matched with that apprentice Coordinator@and those girls from Promised Blood, right?
Small world, huh...

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry, Momoko.
I really wanted to get that prize for you, but@I just couldn't get along with them in the end.

group_1.textRight: You two worked so hard for me.
That by itself makes me happier than you could@ever know.

group_1.textLeft: R-really...?
Oh, that's right!
It's no substitute for the prize, but...
I saved the movie that Yozuru shot and edited@for us!

group_1.textRight: Oh, can I see it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.textCenter: Kaede! What do you think you're doing?!

group_1.narration: ―Momoko―@Wow, you guys had so much fun there!

group_1.textCenter: ...Look, next time, you have to come with us,@alright?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. That's a promise.
